product_highlights: Powerful pre- and probiotics with natural ingredients
notes: Rebiome specializes in comprehensive microbiome skincare solutions, offering prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics in a unified approach. They focus on powerful pre- and probiotics combined with carefully selected natural ingredients to strengthen skin through documented, scientifically-backed effects. Rebiome's approach emphasizes microbiome balance and skin barrier health, providing complete solutions for formulators seeking to create microbiome-friendly products. Strong emphasis on scientific validation and natural ingredient sourcing. Suitable for brands prioritizing microbiome health and natural formulations.
